item.title: BLEH!
item.description: Originally, this article was called “Hello world”. It’s a tradition: The first program you write in a new programming language just prints “Hello world!". I’m not really fond of traditions, and now that I think about it, my first programs usually take the shape of print("BLEH") Or some variation of that. So BLEH it is. In a way, the most interesting aspect of starting a blog is that I don’t even remember hearing the word “blog” from an actual person, recently.
